data.name: ZOSULand 20ZZ
data.description:
*Major update May/23/2022*
*Timed scoring mode: 2 minutes per level = over 72 minutes of gameplay!*
*Freeplay mode: no timer / just explore!*
Climb, fly, grapple over 10 square miles / 28 kilometers of futuristic urban areas in order to save each floating city and the multitude of animals from the invading forces.
- 27 unique city levels + 9 bonus levels to fly through space 
- Over 250 building types to explore and over 40 types of animals to save
- Jetpacks allow flight, grapples in each level available, and you can climb almost anything anywhere
- Destroy robots and dinosaurs
- Motion Sickness Consideration: all horizontal turning can be done using the right joystick in addition to the direction you are looking, while flying move in direction of hand/jetpack.
*Additional 5/23/2022 updates: major game mechanics improvements, new random level selector, level end-scenes with score and animal viewing, added multiple songs, added new animal spawns / animations and some random spawns*
